instruction: Generate a list of benefits for athletes of developing mental toughness.
output:
1. Improved resilience and the ability to better deal with challenges and setbacks.
2. Ability to stay focused in the midst of distractions.
3. Better performance in pressure situations. 
4. Improved ability to maintain a positive attitude and manage stress.
5. The ability to assess situations objectively and make more informed decisions.
6. An improved ability to manage emotions and control impulse decisions.
7. Improved concentration and better communication.
8. Improved performance in competitive situations. 
9. Improved ability to learn from mistakes and adapt quickly to changing conditions.
10. Improved ability to set and achieve higher goals.
